fxInfo_citation: Bernhard et al. (2015, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2015:13); Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Please pay attention to both (A) whether women are prevented from participating in civil society organizations (CSOs) because of their gender and (B) whether CSOs pursuing women’s interests are prevented from taking part in associational life.
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Are women prevented from participating in civil society organizations (CSOs)?
fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2csgender, *_osp, *_ord
